examples.example: 不管做什么事，我们都要有一股不服输的劲儿，要勇争第一，绝不当第二。

translate.english: No matter what we do, we should have a spirit of not admitting defeat, strive to be the first, and never be the second.

examples.example: 生活中虽然会遇到一些困难，但我们要保持乐观积极的心态，办法总比困难多，可不能一根筋认死理，要懂得灵活应变，做到举一反三、触类旁通，绝不当二愣子。

translate.english: In life, although we will encounter some difficulties, we should keep an optimistic and positive attitude. There are always more solutions than difficulties. We can't be stubborn and inflexible. We should know how to be flexible and adaptable, be able to draw inferences from one instance and understand by analogy, and never be a fool.
